Biography

Awards

2020 Raider Academic Honor Roll

2022 Patriot League Academic Honor Roll

Senior (2021-22)

Outdoor: Competed in three meets ....placed eighth in the 400 and helped 4x400 relay team to a fifth place finish at the Lafayette Open ...ran to an 11th place finish in the 400-meter dash at the UB Spring Opener ...was member of 4x100 relay team that took ninth at the Patriot League Outdoor Championship.

Indoor: Participated in three meets ...took second in the 500-meter dash at the Colgate Class of '32 Invitational ... helped her distance medley relay team to a second place finish at the Utica Pioneer Invite ...was also member of distance medley relay team that took ninth at the Patriot League Indoor Championship.

Junior (2020-21)

Outdoor Track: Ran in three outdoor meets … Finished eighth at the Lehigh Season Opener in the 800-meter race with a time of 2:41.92 … Notched a ninth-place finish in the 400-meter dash at the 2021 Lafayette Open.

Indoor Track: Competed in both indoor meets for the Raiders … Placed third in the 200-meter dash at the Colgate Invite … Finished third in the 400-meter dash at the Patriot League Pod Meet.

Sophomore (2019-20)

Indoor Track: Competed in six meets ... Had her highest individual finish at second in the 500 Meters at the Class of '32 Invitational ... Also contributed to a win in the 4x400m Relay at the same meet.

Freshman (2018-19)

Outdoor Track: Participated in five meets ... Had her quickest time of the year in the 200 Meter Dash at the Hamilton Invitational with a mark of 28.37 ... Finished sixth in the 800 Meter Run at the Hamilton Mid-Week with a PR time of 2:33.52 ... Finished the year with a PR time of 1:01.38 in the 400 Meter Dash to finish 20th at the Patriot League Championships.

Indoor Track: Competed in seven meets ... Had her best time of the season at 1:52.35 in the 600 Meter Run at the Pioneer Winter Classic ... Also had a season-best time of 5:58.41 in the One Mile Run in Utica ... Ran her fastest time of the year in the 800 Meter Run in 2:30.01 at the Great Dane Invite ... Ran the 400 Meter Dash in 1:03.47 at the Kane Invite, which was her quickest time of the year in the event ... Finished the season with her best time of the year in the 500 Meter Dash with a time of 1:21.87 at the Patriot League Championships.

Before Colgate: Attended the Latin School of Chicago where she lettered in cross country and track and field...Earned three all-conference honors during her time with the Romans ... Was part of a conference and sectional championship team at the Latin School in 2018 ... Is the school record holder in the 4x400 ... Was named team MVP in 2017 ... Was the captain for both the cross country and track & field teams her senior season ... Graduated Cum Laude and was part of the Erasmus Society.

Personal: Full name is Sarah Elizabeth Silverman…Parents are John and Penne Silverman...Has one brother…Born in Chicago, Ill.
